act_summary: This section of the Companies Act, 2013 regulates companies incorporated under this act or any other applicable law. It applies to various types of companies including those governed by special Acts and specifies that certain provisions will come into force on a specific date as notified by the Central Government. The key requirements include adherence to the Indian Companies Act, 1866, Insurance Act, 1938, Banking Regulation Act, 1949, Electricity Act, 2003, and other relevant laws applicable in certain territories.
